TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ActivityAction`5<T1, T2, T3, T4, T5> extends System.Activities.ActivityDelegate
Public NotInheritable Class ActivityAction(Of T1, T2, T3, T4, T5) Inherits ActivityDelegate
generic <typename T1, typename T2, typename T3, typename T4, typename T5> public ref class ActivityAction sealed : System::Activities::ActivityDelegate

typeparam.name: T1
typeparam.span: 活动委托的第一个 In 自变量的类型。

span.span: The type of the first in argument of the activity delegate.

typeparam.name: T2
typeparam.span: 活动委托的第二个 In 自变量的类型。

span.span: The type of the second in argument of the activity delegate.

typeparam.name: T3
typeparam.span: 活动委托的第三个 In 自变量的类型。

span.span: The type of the third in argument of the activity delegate.

typeparam.name: T4
typeparam.span: 活动委托的第四个 In 自变量的类型。

span.span: The type of the fourth in argument of the activity delegate.

typeparam.name: T5
typeparam.span: 活动委托的第五个 In 自变量的类型。

span.span: The type of the fifth in argument of the activity delegate.

summary.span: 定义一个具有五个 In 自变量并且不返回值的活动委托。

span.span: Defines an activity delegate that has five in arguments and does not return a value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 活动委托允许开发人员定义第三方在访问活动时需要指定的签名。An activity delegate allows a developer to define the required signature of an activity that will be specified by a third party. 此类型具有多个泛型版本，这些版本对所调用的活动采用 1 到 16 个参数。There are multiple generic versions of this type that take from 1 to 16 arguments for the activity that is called. 对于返回值的活动委托，还有 **ActivityFunc** 类型。There are also **ActivityFunc** types for activity delegates that return values.
